pyepo.model.opt
===============

.. py:module:: pyepo.model.opt

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Abstract optimization model



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   pyepo.model.opt.optModel


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: optModel

   Bases: :py:obj:`abc.ABC`


   This is an abstract class for an optimization model

   .. attribute:: _model

      underlying solver model object

      :type: optimization model


   .. py:method:: __repr__()


   .. py:property:: num_cost

      number of costs to be predicted


   .. py:method:: _getModel()
      :abstractmethod:


      An abstract method to build a model from an optimization solver

      :returns: optimization model and variables
      :rtype: tuple



   .. py:method:: setObj(c)
      :abstractmethod:


      An abstract method to set the objective function

      :param c: cost of objective function
      :type c: ndarray



   .. py:method:: solve()
      :abstractmethod:


      An abstract method to solve the model

      :returns: optimal solution (list) and objective value (float)
      :rtype: tuple



   .. py:method:: copy()

      A method to copy the model

      :returns: new copied model
      :rtype: optModel



   .. py:method:: addConstr(coefs, rhs)
      :abstractmethod:


      An abstract method to add a new constraint

      :param coefs: coefficients of the new constraint
      :type coefs: ndarray
      :param rhs: right-hand side of new constraint
      :type rhs: float

      :returns: new model with the added constraint
      :rtype: optModel



   .. py:method:: relax()

      An unimplemented method to relax the MIP model
